name: YogaTrail, Inc.
description: Operator of a business-management platform intended to manage and grow a yoga business. The company's platform offers marketing package to yoga providers at various levels, provides updates from favorite yoga teachers and studios, manages yoga classes, engages students, accepts bookings, and attracts new clients, enabling yoga professionals to manage their business and keep all their yogis in the loop with classes, upcoming events, and announcements.
one_liner: Operator of a business-management platform intended to manage and grow a yoga business. The company's platform offers marketing package to yoga providers at various levels, provides updates from favorite yoga teachers and studios, manages yoga classes, engages students, accepts bookings, and attracts new clients, enabling yoga professionals to manage their business and keep all their yogis in the loop with classes, upcoming events, and announcements.
